name: ApicaLoadtest
helpMarkDown: This task can be used to run an Apica Loadtest using Azure DevOps.
author: ApicaSystem

inputs.helpMarkDown: The ALT API base URL. The default SaaS value is https://api-ltp.apicasystem.com/v1. You can also enter the URL of your on-premise installation.
inputs.label: ALT API base URL:
inputs.name: apiBaseUrl

inputs.helpMarkDown: Your ALT authentication token. You can copy it from your profile page in the Apica ALT page. Example value: af41e8c5-c3c2-4c66-adbc-87571e84643f
inputs.label: ALT authentication token:
inputs.name: apiAuthenticationToken

inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the load test preset as you saved it in ALT.
inputs.label: Preset name:
inputs.name: presetName

inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the load test scenario to run the loadtest with e.g myscenario.class or scenario1.zip.
inputs.label: Load test scenario:
inputs.name: scenarioName

instanceNameFormat: Run Apica Loadtest with preset $(presetName) and scenario $(scenarioName)
